name: Key
description: A key item which is required to progress.

fields.name: Item Type
fields.description: Specifies what type of item this object represents.

1.name: Big Key
1.description: A large key used for special doors.

2.name: Letter
2.description: A letter for a quest event.

6.name: Moon Pearl
6.description: Prevents transformation in the Dark World.

7.name: Bombos Medallion
7.description: A magical medallion with fire-based effects.

8.name: Quake Medallion
8.description: A magical medallion that causes earthquakes.

9.name: Book
9.description: A book required for an event.

fields.name: Activated by Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers or activates this actor (Flag must be set).

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers or activates this actor (Activated by Variable must be set).

fields.name: Unknown Variable
fields.description: An unknown value related to this item.

fields.name: Appearance Type
fields.description: Determines how the key appears in the game.

72.name: Activated with Pegasus Boots
72.description: Can be activated by dashing into it.
